definitions.definition: A stork of the genus Mycteria (formerly Tantalus ), especially the American wood stork , Mycteria americana .
A stand in which to lock up drink decanters while keeping them visible.
Something of an evasive or retreating nature, something consistently out of reach; a tantalising thing.

main_definition: A stork of the genus Mycteria (formerly Tantalus ), especially the American wood stork , Mycteria americana .
secondary_definitions: A stand in which to lock up drink decanters while keeping them visible.
Something of an evasive or retreating nature, something consistently out of reach; a tantalising thing.
